|vendor_id = 1814 |device_id = 0201 |subvendor_id = 1737 |subdevice_id = 0032 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = Q87-WMP54GV4 |icid = 3839A-WMP54GV4 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0C:41, 00:0F:66, 00:12:17
|chip1 = Ralink;RT2560; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2525; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WPIR-107G |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/14/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== WMP54G v4 serial numbers appear to start with '''MDI3'''.
Not supported by the Ralink RT256x/RT266x drivers.
Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7S-4 (Linksys HGA7S, high gain antenna) and Q87-HGA5S-4 (Linksys HGA5S, high gain antenna)
